snippet.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops - Escalation DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops gets new content and maps in the DLC pack Escalation. The developers show you what to expect in the downloadable content for the game. 

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
